segments.text: I see the children in their little game, so full of life and mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me smile to see their teamwork as they attempt to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, there’s a looming sense of dread as I watch the boy on that rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I want to warn him, scream for him to get down, but I remain silent, just an observer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl’s eager stance, her hand reaching out, is both sweet and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her anticipation, but I also think about the consequences of their actions.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls? What if the woman turns around?
segments.speaker: PAR
